name: Subscription events are aware of labels

inline.description:
1. Create a subscription in a project without label ex: /gitlab subscriptions add dhaussermann/dkh-public issues,merges"
2. Create an issue in the target project with no label

customFields.Important notes about this step: Ensure the project has a valid webhook to deliver the subscription event

inline.description:
1. Update the subscription in a project with a label ex: /gitlab subscriptions add dhaussermann/dkh-public issues,merges,label:"pineapple"
2. Create an issue in the target project with no label
inline.expectedResult: Issue creation event is notÂ delivered as the target label was missing

customFields.Important notes about this step: Ensure the project has a valid webhook to deliver the subscription event

inline.description: 1. Create an issue in the target project with the target label

customFields.Important notes about this step: Ensure the project has a valid webhook to deliver the subscription event
